proposals.gesture: Place the cursor before the word and then expand with the thumb and index to select multiple words, then move the whole hand to move the selected words (mentioned in reorder single) (or with use the index finger to reorder - old proposal)
proposals.reasons: It is easy to interpertate, easy to use
proposals.notes: Later he suggested using both hands for selection of longer phrases, so that you can expand more than just using your thumb and index

proposals.example: How far had Morino lived in America? (far->long)
proposals.gesture: Select the word using the index and thumb fingers (expand) and then type, it will be deleted once you start typing.
proposals.notes: Suggested a dropdown menu after selecting a word to select a replacement word. He prefer one hand
